page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: HOWARD JONES is a pop star. He is a solo artist and has had many songs in the 'Top 40'. He was born in Hythe in 1956, but did not live there for long. He is 30 years old and his birthday is 24 February. He is married to a lady called Jan. He has a mongrel dog called Ben and a cat called Puss. Howard's favourite colour is orange. He loves wearing silky clothes and sometimes he wears hats. "It makes a change," he says. If he gives money to Charity it is usually Animal Rights. At the moment he is running a competition called "War on Want". Different schools and colleges are raising money for Ethiopia, and whichever school or college raises the most, Howard will appear 'live' in concert at their school or college. He has made three albums. His newest is called "Dream into Action".
